string-array.name: class_A
string-array.item: I cannot hold back anymore. Gongratulations, you did it.

string-array.name: class_B
string-array.item: I think you are going to make it.

string-array.name: class_C
string-array.item: If you keep this up you will pass.

string-array.name: class_D
string-array.item: Not a great start but still a lot of questions to check.
I hope you score better at the end of the exam.

string-array.name: class_E
string-array.item: This looks bad but there is still a chance.
You might still pass but it is going to be tough.
